channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: 47 per cent of migrant workers in dorms have had a Covid-19 infection, say Manpower and Health Ministries
item.description:
December 15, 2020 12:01 AM

SINGAPORE - Almost half of migrant workers living in dormitories have had a Covid-19 infection, the authorities said on Monday (Dec 14).
